sn45.122-126:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yamuna nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.122-126:1.3: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, aciravati nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.122-126:1.5: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, sarabhu nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.122-126:1.7: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahi nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.122-126:1.9: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ya kacima mahanadiyo, seyyathidam—
sn45.122-126:1.10: ganga, yamuna, aciravati, sarabhu, mahi, sabba ta samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.122-126:1.11: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn45.122-126:1.12: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn45.122-126:1.13: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti amatogadham amataparayanam amatapariyosanam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti amatogadham amataparayanam amatapariyosanam.
sn45.122-126:1.14: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
